titleStmt.title: Voyages and travels over all Europe Containing all that is most curious in that part of the world. In eight tomes. Done out of French.
titleStmt.author: Fer, Nicolas de, 1646-1720.

titleStmt.title: Voyages and travels over all Europe Containing all that is most curious in that part of the world. In eight tomes. Done out of French.
titleStmt.author: Fer, Nicolas de, 1646-1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Rhodes next Bride-Lane in Fleetstreet, and J. Harris at the Harrow in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 (vol. 1) reads: Historical voyages & travels over Europe.
Each volume has separate dated title page, register and pagination.
Volume 1 has frontispiece portrait, folding map between C1 and C2, and three final pages of advertisement.
Volume 2 has order to print dated March 13th. 1692/3.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1964:11 lacks v.2.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 1964:11), and the Bodleian Library (reel 2029:15).
